SSMROnboarding.onboardingTitle2: Why should I enable this service?
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription1: Self Meter Reading is a service you can enable to easily read and submit your own meter readings. We will send you a reminder when it's time to submit.
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription2: You get estimated bills when TNB meter readers can’t get access to your meter. With this service, you will always get bills with accurate readings.

SSMRApplicationTnc.title: Self Meter Reading
SSMRApplicationTnc.termsnCondition: Self Meter Reading Terms and Conditions
SSMRApplicationTnc.tncData:
1.Upon successful registration, you are required to submit your reading for all months except for April, August and December where we will do the reading.

2.Every month, you will receive a notification from us to submit your reading. Kindly submit the readings within the specified date.

3.We will validate your readings immediately upon submission. Once validated, you can view your bill via myTNB Portal and myTNB App on the following day.

4.We will estimate your reading based on average consumption; if the validation is unsuccessful or not submitted within the specified period.

5.We shall make the necessary adjustments if there are any differences found in the readings submitted.

6.You may no longer enjoy this service if:

a)There are no readings submitted for 2 consecutive months.

b)If you no longer meet the requirements (E.g. Supply disconnected, Close of Account, Change of Tariff and others)

Onboarding.title7: Use myTNB with Any Mobile Number.
Onboarding.title11: Enhanced access controls to safeguard your information.
Onboarding.title12: Enhance your moving experience with myHome!
Onboarding.title13: Connect your premises to electricity with ease.
Onboarding.description1:
We're excited for all you can do with this app! But first, choose your preferred language.

Pelbagai manfaat dan kemudahan untuk anda nikmati dengan myTNB! Mulakan dengan menetapkan bahasa pilihan anda.
Onboarding.description2: Track, monitor and stay on top of your electricity usage!
Onboarding.description3: Have easy access to the PDF version of your bills for the past 6 months, all in one place!
Onboarding.description4: Pay your electricity bills while at home, on holiday, on the train – whenever you want to. Say goodbye to late charges and queuing up!
Onboarding.description5: That's right, we're bringing you exclusive perks and freebies - all of this just for myTNB users! Check out the new Rewards section to claim something now!
Onboarding.description6:
We’re now bilingual! You can set your preferred language below.

Kami kini dalam dwibahasa! Anda boleh tetapkan bahasa pilihan anda di bawah.
Onboarding.description7: You can now register a myTNB account or update your existing one with an international phone number.
Onboarding.description8: You can now track all your application status with zero hassle, anytime and anywhere.
Onboarding.description9: Customise your myTNB with your preferred display text size for a more comfortable experience. You may opt between normal or large and can change this anytime in your Profile.
Onboarding.description10: You can now set your meter installation appointment by selecting your preferred date and time slot.
Onboarding.description11: Stay in control of your account information and permissions by defining what you let others access as an owner of an electricity account.
Onboarding.description12: Planning to move in to your home? You can now apply for your electricity account easily and edit your applications with our new feature.
Onboarding.description13: Create new applications and manage your existing electricity accounts anytime!
Onboarding.description14: You can now edit, manage and track all your application status with zero hassle, anytime and anywhere.

SubmitEnquiry.tncAgreeOwner:
Undertaking by the Registered Account Owner

1. I hereby confirm that I, {0} and email ({1}), the registered account holder for the electricity supply {2},  and I have the right to correct and/or update the account information for this account.

2. I hereby certify that the information given in this request and any document(s) submitted are true and accurate.

3. I understand that:

a. it will be necessary for TNB to verify my identity;

b. TNB may contact me for more detailed information regarding this request; and

c. all personal data provided by me in this form will be collected and processed by TNB as personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010.

4.  I hereby agreed to indemnify TNB for any losses, costs and expenses incurred by TNB in connection with this request or in the event that any information and/or document(s) submitted by me is/are not true.

Please be informed that this application is for the privilege use between TNB and its registered account holder and any relevant person with the consent of the registered account holder. TNB shall not be held liable for any improper use and incorrect use of the information described and contained herein and under no obligation to check the authenticity of such consent and permission given. Upon clicking the submit button, you have deemed to read, understood and agreed to the undertaking as displayed
SubmitEnquiry.tncAgreeNonOwner:
Undertaking by the Relevant Person (any person who has been authorized to update personal data on behalf of the account owner)

1. I hereby confirm that I, {0} and email ({1}) , have been authorized by the registered account holder for the electricity supply {2} to correct and/or update the account information for this account.

2. I hereby undertake that consent of the registered account holder has been obtained accordingly for this request and the proof of authorization is attached together with this request.

3. I hereby certify that the information given in request and any document(s) submitted are true and accurate.

4. I understand that:

a. it will be necessary for TNB to verify my identity;

b. TNB may contact me for more detailed information regarding this request; and

c. all personal data provided by me in this form will be collected and processed by TNB as personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010.

5. I hereby agreed to indemnify TNB for any losses, costs and expenses incurred by TNB in connection with this request or in the event that any information and/or document(s) submitted by me is/are not true.

Please be informed that this application is for the privilege use between TNB and its registered account holder and any relevant person with the consent of the registered account holder. TNB shall not be held liable for any improper use and incorrect use of the information described and contained herein and under no obligation to check the authenticity of such consent and permission given. Upon clicking the submit button, you have deemed to read, understood and agreed to the undertaking as displayed

newBillDesignContent.Title: Experience the all-new TNB bill!
newBillDesignContent.Description: The all-new TNB bill is now in an easy-to-read and simplified format to help you make better decisions on managing your energy usage! Let's see what's new:

newBillDesignContent.Title: Your account’s bill summary
newBillDesignContent.Description: Based on the infographic above, you can view your total amount due (Jumlah Bil Anda), the bill due date (Sila Bayar Sebelum), previous balance (Baki Terdahulu), current charges (Caj Semasa), and rounding adjustment (Pelarasan Penggenapan).

newBillDesignContent.Title: Historical energy usage
newBillDesignContent.Description: You can now track your previous 6 months usage and its average to have a better understanding of your usage and charges.

newBillDesignContent.Title: Your full account statement
newBillDesignContent.Description: You can scan this QR code to access a summary of your bills and payments for the past 6 months.

newBillDesignContent.Title: Your electricity usage and tariff
newBillDesignContent.Description: Understand your usage charges in kWh & RM units based on this easy-to-read TNB’s tariff block. View more information on your tariff rates here.
Go to the bill page to view your bills or learn more about the new bill for residential here and for your business here.

gslInfo.title: What is a Guaranteed Service Level (GSL)?
gslInfo.description:
The Guaranteed Service Level (GSL) is our promise to our customers to meet minimum standard requirements. We are here to make your life brighter by providing your electricity supply in a timely and efficient manner.

Types of GSL:

expandCollapseList.title: Frequency of Interruptions
expandCollapseList.description: We’ll make sure that interruptions to your electricity is minimised.

expandCollapseList.title: Restoration Time
expandCollapseList.description: We promise to restore your electricity as soon as we can for unplanned disruptions.

expandCollapseList.title: Service Connection Installation
expandCollapseList.description: We’ll make sure that you receive your electricity connection as quickly and efficiently as we can.

expandCollapseList.title: Meter Installation
expandCollapseList.description: After you’ve paid your deposit, we’ll make sure that your meter is installed.

expandCollapseList.title: Disconnection Procedures
expandCollapseList.description: In the event of a disconnection, the execution will be carried out in accordance to the applicable legislation or disconnection procedures.

gslInfo.title: How can I claim for a Guaranteed Service Level (GSL) rebate?
gslInfo.description:
We will guide you thoroughly on how to claim GSL rebates by following our simple steps. Before you start, please ensure that you have prepared all documents required for our reference as below:

Documents Required:
1. Identity Card / Passport

expandCollapseList.title: Step 1
expandCollapseList.description: Choose an account from the drop-down list, then click on "Guaranteed Service Level (GSL) Rebate"

expandCollapseList.title: Step 2
expandCollapseList.description: Identify and select the type of rebate to claim. For tenants, fill in the contact details. Then click "Proceed"

expandCollapseList.title: Step 3
expandCollapseList.description: Select the date and time of the incident, then click "Next". (You can add more incidents if needed.)

expandCollapseList.title: Step 4
expandCollapseList.description: Download & sign the GSL Application Form. Then, upload it together with your other supporting documents and click "Next".

expandCollapseList.title: Step 5
expandCollapseList.description: Review and confirm your contact details, then proceed to submit.

expandCollapseList.title: Step 6
expandCollapseList.description: You may view the status of your claims on the "View Submitted Enquiry" page.

ServiceDistruptionComm.title: Stay Informed with Service Disruption Notifications!
ServiceDistruptionComm.subTitle1: Starting now, you'll be able to receive Service Disruption notifications and restoration updates which allow you to stay up-to-date when you encounter a power outage.
ServiceDistruptionComm.subTitle2: These notifications are only applicable to TNB electricity services and not any power-trips that may be happening within your premises.
ServiceDistruptionComm.note: *Service Disruption feature is currently only available in Melaka Barat but we will be expanding to more areas soon!
